summary: Less Glow addition for the brilliant Glowing Ore Veins 300 Mod by Baratan.
descriptionHtml:
Glowing Ore Veins 300 Less Glow

========================================================================================

After reading comments on the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/193]Glowing Ore Veins 300[/url] page, i noticed people wanted to have the glow reduced. And since my Photoshop Skills increased lately i decided to give it a go and try out some things, and with succes!

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/193]Glowing Ore Veins 300[/url].
2) Install Glowing Ore Veins 300 Less Glow.

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Baratan for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/193]Glowing Ore Veins 300[/url].
author: Lunyra

files.name: Glowing Ore Veins 300 Less Glow - Even Less Glow
